data.title: David Thwaites on LinkedIn: #ev #infrastructure #sites #acquisitions
data.meta_description:
A day of inspections (20 in fact!) for the hottest day of the year with Be.EV.  

Visited some really good sites, many of which will be ideal in delivering theâ€¦

Interested in working with Be.EV? Weâ€™re seeking experienced Land Agents, Surveyors and Property Specialists to work with us to help locate prime EV charging locations across the UK. Joining our experienced team, we need specialists to assist us part-time in expanding across key UK regions, including: âœ… London âœ… South East âœ… South Coast âœ… Home Counties âœ… Whole of the UK (roadside specialists) We'll provide training to align your skills with the sector and our needs, along with a retainer and, of course, a success fee. With our recent Â£55m boost in funding, we have ample capital to invest, offering a great chance to earn a good level of success fee. The demand for charging infrastructure is on the rise, and you can be part of the Be.EV journey from the start, developing new skills and making a positive impact. For all the details, click here: https://lnkd.in/eHxMcDAA #EVCharging #NetZeroJobs #ElectricVehicles #Property #Land
